name: Square Eyes
description: A website for a fictional company, selling movies.

name: Community Science Museum
description: A HTML & CSS website for a fictional museum for kids.

name: Mountain Life
description: A blog about an area called Kvitdalen, and what to find, see and to do there.

name: ActionHub
description: Auction Hub is a fictional online auction platform built using HTML, SCSS/CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap and Vite. Users can explore and bid on various items, from antiques to electronics, while sellers can easily list their products. The platform offers an exciting real-time bidding experience, with new users receiving 1,000 credits to kickstart their journey.

name: Holidaze
description: Holidaze is a front-end accommodation booking application developed for the Noroff Project Exam 2. The application allows users to browse and book venues while providing an admin-facing dashboard for venue management.
